What is MOS?

MODEL OUTPUT STATISTICS (MOS)
MODEL OUTPUT STATISTICS (MOS)

Relates observed weather elements (PREDICTANDS) to appropriate variables (PREDICTORS) via a statistical approach.
Relates observed weather elements (PREDICTANDS) R e l a t e s
o b s e r v e d
w e a t h e r
e l e m e n t s
( P R E D I C T A N D S )
to appropriate variables (PREDICTORS) via a t o
a p p r o p r i a t e
v a r i a b l e s
( P R E D I C T O R S ) v i a
a
statistical approach.

Predictors are obtained from:
